Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize average story points completed per sprint

Name: minimize_sprint_blockers
Description: Minimize number of unresolved blockers during sprints

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize number of completed features per release

Name: minimize_task_effort_deviation
Description: Minimize difference between estimated and actual task effort

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failure
Description: Minimize number of sprints where goal was not achieved

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence_match
Description: Maximize alignment of implemented features with high-influence stakeholders

Name: maximize_documentation_coverage
Description: Maximize ratio of documented to implemented features

Name: minimize_sprint_planning_duration
Description: Minimize time spent in Sprint Planning meetings

Name: maximize_user_story_clarity
Description: Maximize completeness and clarity of user stories

Name: minimize_epic_split_delay
Description: Minimize time between epic creation and first derived user story

Name: maximize_release_plan_adherence
Description: Maximize percentage of planned features actually released

Name: minimize_daily_scrum_overrun
Description: Minimize duration beyond 15 minutes in Daily Scrums

Name: maximize_skill_coverage_in_team
Description: Maximize alignment of team skills with project feature requirements
